src:
Kevin Lee se llevó la victoria de la UFC con el "nocaut más letal de la semana"
Kevin Lee realizó 3 golpes brutales para derrotar a Gregor Gillespie, un fuerte derechazo, una patada en la cara y un golpe de remate.
03 Nov 2019 by Diego Álvarez
Corrían 2:47 minutos entre el duelo de Kevin Lee ante Gregor Gillespie en la UFC, que tuvo un final sorprendente.
Todo iba bien hasta que Lee aprovechó que su oponente bajó la defensa, le propinó un fuerte derechazo y al desestabilizar a su oponente, le dio una increíble "high kick" en la cara.
Al recibir la patada, Gregor se desploma claramente inconsciente a lo que el árbitro paró la batalla y tuvo que intervenir, ya que Lee lo seguía golpeando para rematarlo.
Tras la victoria, Lee indicó que "Gregor es uno de los mejores luchadores y quería marcar mi regreso contra él. Fue un peleador complicado, pero estoy con un nuevo equipo y quería demostrar de lo que soy capaz".
Mira el impresionante nocaut a continuación:
text:
Kevin Lee took the UFC victory with the "deadliest knockout of the week"
Kevin Lee made 3 brutal strokes to defeat Gregor Gillespie, a strong right, a kick in the face and a shot.
03 Nov 2019 by Diego Álvarez
It was 2:47 minutes between Kevin Lee's duel against Gregor Gillespie in the UFC, which had a surprising end.
Everything was going well until Lee took advantage of the fact that his opponent lowered the defense, gave him a strong right and when he destabilized his opponent, he gave him an incredible high kick in the face.
Upon receiving the kick, Gregor collapses clearly unconscious to what the referee stopped the battle and had to intervene, as Lee kept hitting him to finish it off.
After the victory, Lee indicated that "Gregor is one of the best fighters and wanted to mark my return against him. He was a complicated fighter, but I am with a new team and wanted to prove what I am capable of."
Check out the impressive knockout below:
